entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia late in the morning and in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Temperature steady near plus 5.
